## Spacing {.t1}

::: {.panel-tabset}

### How

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}

#### Line breaks

```
This is some text
<br><br>
SOME TEXT AFTER A SPACE
```

<details>
    <summary>Result</summary>
    This is some text
    <br><br>
    SOME TEXT AFTER A SPACE
</details>


:::

::: {.column width="50%"}

#### Paragraphs

```
<p>This is some paragraph text</p>
<p>SOME TEST AFTER A SPACE</p>
```

<details>
    <summary>Results</summary
    <p>This is some paragraph text</p>
    <p>SOME TEST AFTER A SPACE</p>
</details>


:::

::::

:::: {.columns}

<p>Did your household purchase materials with the intention of undertaking the maintenance or repair of the household itself in the past 12 months?</p>

<p>Consider activities of repair and maintanance that have to be undertaken regularly in order to maintain the dwelling in good working order, that do not change the dwelling’s performance, capacity or expected service life and that, as such, are normally carried out by both owner occupiers and tenants</p>
:::

:::

# Improve inputs `r fontawesome::fa(name = "hand-pointer")` {background-color=var(--s2)}

## Radio buttons v. combo box {.t2}

## Radio buttons too long {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/13/radio_button_too_long.mp4){fig-align="center"}
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

- Too many options
- Occupy most/all of a screen
- Easier to search by typing than scrolling

:::

::::

## Combo box too limiting {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/13/combo_box_too_limiting.mp4){fig-align="center"}
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

- Interviewers don't know list
- Interviewers don't know to search
- Only see first 20 options

:::

::::

## When to use {.t2}

:::: {.columns .incremental}

::: {.column width="50%"}

### Radio buttons

- Less than 10 answer options
- Answer list to be read aloud
- Answer list not known / not amenable to search by typing

:::

::: {.column width="50%"}

### Combo box

- More than 10 answer options
- Interviewer knows that searching to be done
- Answer list known / amenable to typing

:::

::::
